document.full_text: seal, santana and sting will play the 45th annual montreux jazz festival, whose july 1-16 programme was revealed two days early because of leaks, organizers said on tuesday.
document.title: seal, santana and sting to play montreux jazz fest
lines_and_colors: seal, santana and sting will play the 45th annual montreux jazz festival, whose july 1-16 programme was revealed two days early because of leaks, organizers said on tuesday.
